description: This is a modern online bookstore designed for book lovers to easily browse and search for books. The site features a user-friendly interface with intuitive navigation and robust search capabilities. Users can explore featured books, view details, and discover new titles through efficient search functionality.
designNote: The website will have a clean, contemporary look with a focus on book covers and easy navigation. Neutral colors and ample whitespace will be used to create a welcoming and uncluttered experience.

pages.name: HomePage
pages.purpose: Serves as the main landing page, showcasing featured books and popular categories.
pages.usage: Users can browse highlighted books, view categories, and navigate to book details or the search page.
pages.designNote: Features a hero section, a carousel of featured books, and category tiles in a grid layout.

pages.name: BookDetailPage
pages.purpose: Displays detailed information about a selected book, including its cover, description, and author.
pages.usage: Users access this page by clicking on a book from the HomePage or SearchPage to learn more about it.
pages.designNote: Prominent book cover image, with sections for title, author, description, and related books.

pages.name: SearchPage
pages.purpose: Allows users to search for books by title, author, or category using keywords and filters.
pages.usage: Users enter search terms or select filters to find specific books, then click results to view details.
pages.designNote: A search bar at the top, filter options on the side, and a responsive grid of book results.
